alert.note: Alert for Central Somerset; Northern Franklin (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 28 at 3:08PM EST until December 29 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Light freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Central Somerset and Northern Franklin Counties. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to noon EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Slippery conditions are possible due to developing icy road conditions later tonight. The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday morning commute.
info.instruction: Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. If you are going outside, watch your first few steps taken on stairs, sidewalks, and driveways. These surfaces could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
